xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 6 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 6.1 Paṭiccavāra » 6.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 6.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
1.
2806Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. (1)
2807Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
2808Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. (3)
2809Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ; khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
2.
2810Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. (1)
2811Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesike khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
2812Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. (3)
2813Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
2814Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
